===============================================
C√ÅC B·∫¢NG D·ªÆ LI·ªÜU MONGODB CHO D·ª∞ √ÅN TRANDUCBPO
===============================================

üìä DANH S√ÅCH C√ÅC COLLECTION C·∫¶N T·∫†O:

1. USERS (Ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng)
2. PRODUCTS (S·∫£n ph·∫©m) 
3. ORDERS (ƒê∆°n h√†ng)
4. PAYMENTS (Thanh to√°n)
5. CART_ITEMS (Gi·ªè h√†ng)

===============================================
CHI TI·∫æT C√ÅC COLLECTION
===============================================

1. COLLECTION: users
   - M√¥ t·∫£: L∆∞u tr·ªØ th√¥ng tin ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng h·ªá th·ªëng
   - Fields:
     * _id: ObjectId (auto-generated)
     * fullname: String (required) - H·ªç t√™n ƒë·∫ßy ƒë·ªß
     * email: String (required, unique) - Email ƒëƒÉng nh·∫≠p
     * password: String (required) - M·∫≠t kh·∫©u ƒë√£ m√£ h√≥a
     * shippingAddress: String (optional) - ƒê·ªãa ch·ªâ giao h√†ng
     * gender: Enum (optional) - Gi·ªõi t√≠nh: "Male" | "FeMale"
     * role: Enum (optional) - Vai tr√≤: "User" | "Admin"
     * ƒêi·ªÉm t√≠ch lu·ªπ: float 10% of 1 bill 
     * favourites: [ObjectId] (optional) - Danh s√°ch s·∫£n ph·∫©m y√™u th√≠ch
     * createdAt: Date (auto-generated)
     * updatedAt: Date (auto-generated)

2. COLLECTION: products
   - M√¥ t·∫£: L∆∞u tr·ªØ th√¥ng tin s·∫£n ph·∫©m
   - Fields:
     * _id: ObjectId (auto-generated)
     * name: String (required) - T√™n s·∫£n ph·∫©m
     * description: String (optional) - M√¥ t·∫£ s·∫£n ph·∫©m
     * price: Number (required) - Gi√° s·∫£n ph·∫©m
     * quantity: Number (required) - S·ªë l∆∞·ª£ng t·ªìn kho
     * typeProduct: Enum (required) - Lo·∫°i s·∫£n ph·∫©m: "New Product" | "Best Seller"
     * rate: enum/float
     * comment?: string
     * url?: object[]: a lot image or video
     * createdAt: Date (auto-generated)
     * updatedAt: Date (auto-generated)

3. COLLECTION: orders
   - M√¥ t·∫£: L∆∞u tr·ªØ th√¥ng tin ƒë∆°n h√†ng
   - Fields:
     * _id: ObjectId (auto-generated)
     * items: Array (required) - Danh s√°ch s·∫£n ph·∫©m trong ƒë∆°n h√†ng
       - productId: String (required) - ID s·∫£n ph·∫©m
       - productName: String (required) - T√™n s·∫£n ph·∫©m
       - price: Number (required) - Gi√° t·∫°i th·ªùi ƒëi·ªÉm mua
       - quantity: Number (required) - S·ªë l∆∞·ª£ng mua
     * totalPrice: Number (required) - T·ªïng gi√° tr·ªã ƒë∆°n h√†ng
     * status: Enum (required) - Tr·∫°ng th√°i: "Pending" | "Paid" | "Shipped" | "Completed" | "Cancelled"
     * createdAt: Date (auto-generated)
     * updatedAt: Date (auto-generated)

4. COLLECTION: payments
   - M√¥ t·∫£: L∆∞u tr·ªØ th√¥ng tin thanh to√°n
   - Fields:
     * _id: ObjectId (auto-generated)
     * method: String (required) - Ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c thanh to√°n
     * date: Date (required) - Ng√†y thanh to√°n
     * items: [ObjectId] (optional) - Tham chi·∫øu ƒë·∫øn CartItem

5. COLLECTION: cart_items
   - M√¥ t·∫£: L∆∞u tr·ªØ c√°c item trong gi·ªè h√†ng
   - Fields:
     * _id: ObjectId (auto-generated)
     * productId: String (required) - ID s·∫£n ph·∫©m
     * productName: String (required) - T√™n s·∫£n ph·∫©m
     * price: Number (required) - Gi√° s·∫£n ph·∫©m
     * quantity: Number (required) - S·ªë l∆∞·ª£ng
     * url: String (optional) - Link ·∫£nh s·∫£n ph·∫©m
6. COLLECTION: Comment
- M√¥ t·∫£: Comment cho guest and User
- Fields:
* userId?: string
* comment: string
* proudctId: string
===============================================
QUAN H·ªÜ GI·ªÆA C√ÅC COLLECTION
===============================================

- users.favourites ‚Üí products._id (Many-to-Many)
- payments.items ‚Üí cart_items._id (One-to-Many)
- orders.items (Embedded documents - kh√¥ng c√≥ reference)

===============================================
ENUMS ƒê∆Ø·ª¢C S·ª¨ D·ª§NG
===============================================

Gender Enum:
- Male
- FeMale

User Role Enum:
- User
- Admin  
- Manager

Product Type Enum:
- New Product
- Best Seller

Order Status Enum:
- Pending
- Paid
- Shipped
- Completed
- Cancelled

===============================================
GHI CH√ö QUAN TR·ªåNG
===============================================

1. T·∫•t c·∫£ collection ƒë·ªÅu s·ª≠ d·ª•ng Mongoose Schema v·ªõi NestJS
2. Timestamps ƒë∆∞·ª£c t·ª± ƒë·ªông th√™m v√†o: users, products, orders
3. ObjectId ƒë∆∞·ª£c s·ª≠ d·ª•ng cho c√°c reference gi·ªØa collections
4. Email trong users collection ph·∫£i unique
5. C√°c enum ƒë∆∞·ª£c ƒë·ªãnh nghƒ©a trong common/enums/
6. S·ª≠ d·ª•ng @Prop decorator ƒë·ªÉ ƒë·ªãnh nghƒ©a schema properties

===============================================

*** Th√™m theme

*** login b·∫±ng social kh√°c
*** guest mu·ªën pay generate ra m·∫≠t kh·∫©u send v·ªÅ Email, cho nh·∫≠p email tr∆∞·ªõc
